    pycheron.dataAcq.css¶

    read_wfdisc(file)[source]¶

    Reads in wfdisc file into a Pandas DataFrame.

    Parameters:file (str) – wfdisc file
    Returns:Pandas DataFrame
    Return type:pandas.DataFrame
    get_wfdisc_stations(wfdisc_dir)[source]¶

    Gets all of the stations contained in wfdisc file

    Parameters:wfdisc_dir (str) – the directory containing wfdisc
    Returns:list of all stations in wfdisc
    Return type:list
    css2stream(wfdisc_dir, network, station, byDay=False)[source]¶

    Takes in a wfdisc file, reads it, and takes the waveform files and converits them to a stream

    Parameters:
    • wfdisc_dir (str) – Directory containing wfdisc file
    • network (str) – Network which the stations in the wfdisc belong to
    • station (str) – The station which should be extraced from file and stream created
    Returns:

    Stream for certain station
    Return type:

    obspy.core.stream.Stream
